scripts.build-run: cd backend && npm run build && npm start
scripts.start-browse-windows: npm run build && npm run backend-browse-windows && npm run start
scripts.start-browse-linux: npm run build && npm run backend-browse-linux && npm run start
scripts.build-browse-windows: npm run build && npm run backend-browse-windows
scripts.build-browse-linux: npm run build && npm run backend-browse-linux
